{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RT-AC52U |revision=B1 |upc= |ean= |asin=B016YJUZQY |newegg= |price= |est_release_date=03/27/2017 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=SGE |manuf_model=PN752 |manuf_rev=A1 |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=MSQ-RTAC52U |ic_id= |us_id= |pcb_id=H19804PN752A1 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7620A |cpu1_cspeed=580 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=GigaDevice |fla1_model=GD25Q128CSIG |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5TU32M16EG-AC |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, 3.3V TTL,, J2,, |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7620A |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7610E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains=1 |wi2_rxchains=1 |wi2_sstreams=1 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model=RTL8367RB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module (FEM);Skyworks;SKY85712-21;SKY21, 65712, G41WC;1; |flags=AiCloud support |stock_boot=U-Boot; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.36; |tp_firmware=Padavan (WiP) |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS, ASUS_5G |default_ssid_regex=^ASUS$, ^ASUS_5G$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=2C:4D:54 |oui_eth=2C:4D:54 }} {{TagLine|AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router}} with two high-gain antennas and USB port :{{SupportPage/sandbox|vendor=ASUS|model=RT-AC52U-B1}} "H19804PN752A1", "E248779" and "1647" (11/2016) :is silkscreened on the board in the photos. Future support may be available with {{TPFirmware|Padavan}} ? (WiP) :The bootloader used is assumed to be '''U-Boot'''. Default SSIDs are per the manual. :PN: 90IG00D0-BU2N00 (B00T2PVGNE) :PN: 90IG00D0-BM3N00 (B00HWR17MO) Combo (+ USB-AC50 adapter) ===Additional specifications=== * USB functionality: 3G/4G, printer server, network storage * Multiple SSIDs: up to 6 (3x 2.4GHz, 3x 5GHz) * Antennas: 2x external 5dBi antenna, 1x internal antenna * Operation mode: Wireless router, Access point, Media bridge * Dimensions (W x D x H): [[Dimensions::189 mm x 129 mm x 36 mm]] * Weight: [[Weight::270 g]] ===Reviews=== *[https://itwriter.ru/2017/03/27/asus-rt-ac52u-b1/ ''Asus RT-AC52U B1'' on '''IT|Writer'''] (RU) *[https://www.redeszone.net/asus/rt-ac52u-b1-ac750/ ''Asus RT-AC52U B1'' on '''RedesZone'''] (ES) ===Forum threads=== *[http://forums.smallnetbuilder.com/showthread.php?p=80332 On '''SmallNetBuilder'''] (EN) *[http://forum.ixbt.com/topic.cgi?id=14:60674 On '''iXBT'''] (RU) ===See also=== *[[ASUS RT-AC52U]] - AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Router *[[ASUS 4G-AC55U]] - AC1200 4G LTE Router *[[ASUS 4G-N12]] - N300 4G LTE Router *[[ASUS DSL-AC68U]] - AC1900 ADSL2+/VDSL2 Modem Router
